projects.title: MindLyfe Platform
projects.subtitle: Comprehensive well-being ecosystem
projects.description: A robust web and mobile application designed to enhance personal well-being. Built with a focus on seamless user experience across platforms, integrating advanced data management and intuitive UI components.

seo.metaDescription: MindLyfe Platform: A comprehensive web and mobile ecosystem for personal well-being developed by Mark Cole Mukisa.

projects.title: MovieBox App
projects.subtitle: Modern movie management system
projects.description: Built using Laravel, this application features a full CRUD system for managing movie databases. It showcases high-performance PHP backend logic paired with a clean, responsive frontend.

seo.metaDescription: MovieBox App: A modern movie management system with full CRUD operations, built with Laravel by Mark Cole Mukisa.

projects.title: Geta WaterBill
projects.subtitle: Utility management for landlords
projects.description: A specialized billing application for property managers to track and manage water consumption. Utilizes Tailwind CSS for a utility-first styling approach and jQuery for dynamic interactions.

seo.metaDescription: Geta WaterBill: A utility management application for landlords, built with Tailwind CSS and jQuery by Mark Cole Mukisa.

projects.title: Quikie Payroll
projects.subtitle: Smart payroll calculation engine
projects.description: An automated payroll system that calculates gross pay, tax deductions, and net salary. Focusing on accuracy and speed, it demonstrates efficient JavaScript logic for business applications.

seo.metaDescription: Quikie Payroll: A smart payroll calculation engine built with JavaScript by Mark Cole Mukisa.
